title: Ticket #2200: Improve computation of submitter limits to re-share unused slots
description:
Currently, the submitter limit computations do not examine a submitter's number of jobs. So, one can get situations where a submitter might be awarded 10 slots based on its priority, even if it only needs 5 of them to run its jobs. The surplus will get picked up on subsequent pie spins, but it would be more efficient to enhance the submitter limit logic so that it more closely resembles the surplus quota sharing logic in hgq_allocate_surplus_loop().

(This could be thought of as a sort of generalization of #2194)
